tasks.task: Conduct a termination process for farm employees.
subtasks: Check if the state is an at-will employment state.
Confirm the termination is not due to a protected class under discrimination laws.
Deliver the termination notice in private.
Have another supervisor present during the termination.
Be clear and concise during the termination conversation.
Address specific issues, such as attendance.
Pay for the last day worked within 72 hours (遵守劳工部门要求)。
Provide a manual check during the termination meeting.
Recover issued business property, ensure signing of receipt.
Escort the employee to their car or arrange safe departure.
Notify law enforcement if threats or violence arise.
Limit references to former employment when requested.
